HomePage.title: Welcome to BioSystems Indonesia
HomePage.description: BioSystems Indonesia provides laboratory instruments and reagents for clinical laboratories, hospitals, and medical facilities.

Home.desc-slide-1: Supporting clinical and analytical excellence through proven, high-performance laboratory solutions.
Home.h1-slide-2: Reliable outcomes begin with robust systems
Home.desc-slide-2: Our dedication goes beyond product excellence we partner with users at every stage, providing complete support to help them achieve their goals.
Home.desc-slide-3: Covering instruments, reagents, and expertise to support reliable laboratory performance.

Solutions.content: Since 1981, we have focused on developing analytical solutions for in vitro diagnostics (IVD) throughout the entire value chain. We provide laboratory technicians with robust systems that ensure reliable results for informed decision-making.

item1.title: 24h Customer Support
item1.desc: Support via phone or WhatsApp—so you can rely on us whenever you need assistance.

item2.title: Trusted Quality & Stability
item2.desc: Produced under one fully integrated facility, our reagents and instruments guarantee excellent quality and stability.

item3.title: Reliable Supply
item3.desc: With up to 6 months of buffer stock, we help your lab run without interruptions.

item4.title: After-Sales Without Worries
item4.desc: From installation, training, calibration, to maintenance and spare part replacement—our services are provided free of charge.

item5.title: Free Shipping Nationwide
item5.desc: We provide complimentary shipping for all non-e-catalog orders nationwide.

InsideOurLab.title: Inside Our Laboratory
InsideOurLab.description: Built to support clinical decision-making through precise, validated analytical workflows.

News.title: NEWS
News.description: Curated insights that translate scientific developments into practical guidance for laboratories and professionals.

CTA.title: We would be glad to help you!
CTA.addressText: Jl. Kyai Caringin No. 18-A RT 10/RW 4. Cideng, Kecamatan Gambir, Kota Jakarta Pusat. Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta

Instrument.descTitle: Analytical systems to enhance patient care and drive research forward
Instrument.descContent: Our analytical solutions combine clinical biochemistry instruments, reagents, and reference materials for accurate laboratory testing. They support kidney and cardiac monitoring, help track treatment response, and generate biomarker data that advances patient care and medical research in diabetes, cardiovascular health, kidney disorders, and fertility.

BA400.heroDesc: BA400 is a clinical chemistry analyser that improves your laboratory resources and minimise the required system maintenance
BA400.spec1Desc: New enhanced maneuvers reduce samples loading time and minimise the attention required by the user.
BA400.spec2Desc: The reagent barcoding and volume detection system allow to manage the amount of reagent in the system at anytime
BA400.spec3Desc: The reagent barcoding and volume detection system allow to manage the amount of reagent in the system at anytime
BA400.dimensionDesc: Our main goal is to optimise the laboratory workflow and improve the user experience. The BA400 forms a complete systems that perfectly adapts to the demands of the laboratories in its reagents.
BA400.dimensions: Dimensions: 1258 mm x 720 mm x 1200 mm
BA400.ba200Desc: BA200 is a full automatic analyser with high reagent and sample capacity (88 position), the highest grade in flexibility.
BA400.a15Desc: A15 is a small size and low demanding analyser that facilitates automation of tests.
BA400.btsDesc: BTS is a manual analyser with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory

BA200.heroDesc: BA200 is a clinical chemistry analyser that improves your laboratory resources and minimise the required system maintenance
BA200.spec1Desc: The optical bench is based on our patented LED technology, which requires the minimum maintenance and allows the longest lifespan.
BA200.spec2Desc: The reagent barcoding and volume detection system allow to manage the amount of reagent in the system at anytime
BA200.spec3Desc: Automation saves time and avoids manual procedures. The new automatic hemolysis function guarantees more accurate results.
BA200.dimensionDesc: In combination with the original validated BA reagents (complete panel of clinical chemistry including special tests), the BA200 forms a complete system that perfectly adapts to the demands of the laboratories in its segment.
BA200.ba400Desc: BA200 is a full automatic analyser with automatic hemolysis on whole blood samples and fast sample loading.
BA200.a15Desc: A15 is a small size and low demanding analyser that facilitates automation of tests.
BA200.btsDesc: BTS is a manual analyser with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory

A15.heroDesc: A15 is a small size and low demanding analyzer that facilitates automation of tests, reducing working time and improving the laboratory efficiency.
A15.spec1Desc: With a long history on the market, we still find new niches or applications to explore.
A15.spec2Desc: We have come a long way to provide a simple solution for laboratory automation.
A15.spec3Desc: Dedicated and validated reagents ensure a robust and reliable analytical system.
A15.dimensionTitle: A15 system is a perfect option for different size laboratories
A15.dimensionDesc: A long history of collaboration with users to improve this analyzer, together with a complete panel of clinical chemistry reagents.
A15.ba400Desc: BA400 is a full automatic analyzer with automatic hemolysis on whole blood samples and fast sample loading.
A15.ba200Desc: BA200 is a full automatic analyzer with high reagent and sample capacity (88 position), the highest grade in flexibility.
A15.btsDesc: BTS is a manual analyser with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory

BTS.heroDesc: BTS is a manual analyzer with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to-use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory.
BTS.spec1Desc: The optics based on our patented LED technology, together with the full operating system included in BTS and the new colour touch screen will lead users to a new experience.
BTS.spec2Desc: Guarantee your results due to high optical quality quartz flow cell, quality control management (up to 3 levels) and validated reagents for the new BTS.
BTS.spec3Desc: Save time and resources thanks to low maintenance cost, with an upgradable and flexible device.
BTS.spec4Desc: Connect and access all your data through any of your devices, without any intermediate software.
BTS.dimensionDesc: Easy to use and intuitive semiautomatic analyzer, designed and developed together with users. Improve your lab resources using the latest technological advances.
BTS.ba400Desc: BA400 is a full automatic analyser with automatic hemolysis on whole blood samples and fast sample loading.
BTS.a15Desc: A15 is a small size and low demanding analyser that facilitates automation of tests.
BTS.btsDesc: BTS is a manual analyser with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory

COAX.heroDesc: COAX is a semi-automated coagulometer that complementary optimize your laboratory routine
COAX.spec1Title: The optimal complement to your routine laboratory
COAX.spec1Desc: Ready for the daily routine and the upcoming requirements.
COAX.spec4Desc: The coagulation reagents have been specifically validated to BioSystems coagulometers.
COAX.dimensionDesc: The management and control of anticoagulant therapy has never been so easy.
COAX.ba400Desc: BA400 is a full automatic analyser with automatic hemolysis on whole blood samples and fast sample loading.
COAX.a15Desc: A15 is a small size and low demanding analyser that facilitates automation of tests.
COAX.btsDesc: BTS is a manual analyser with LED optics system and a new intuitive and easy-to use software that will ease your daily work in the laboratory

ClinicalAnalysis.heroDesc: We deliver analytical products and automation systems for biochemistry and autoimmunity, using high-quality materials and validated processes to ensure reliable results.
ClinicalAnalysis.ourProductsTitle: A wide range of reagents covering multiple testing parameters
ClinicalAnalysis.ourProductsDesc: Covering a broad spectrum of testing parameters, from routine biochemistry to specialized clinical panels.

Article.heroDescription: Health insights, the latest news, and product education from BioSystems to support clinical laboratory needs.
